page.title: 14THE LAMB INN SPAXTON.
page.content: The Lamb Inn is down Barford Road.We visited the pub and we got this information.Darts is a very popular game in the pub called the Lamb Inn.Special matches are played and they raise money for the local youth club.They have a winter match and a summer match, trophies can be won.Skittle matches is another game they play. They have four skittle matches a week. People come from other villages to have a drink. They employ people and about twenty people come to the pub each night. The people who own the pub have been in the village for three years. They sell meals regulary and they hold private parties and sometimes they hold wedding receptions roughly two a month and they also hold meetings. No bed and breakfast trade. There is a large garden in the rear and a medium size car park.
